MissingPrimaryKeyException
Thrown if an entity hasn't a field that is annotated with Id.
MissingValueException
Thrown if a parameter of a function requires a non-null value, but it is null.
NoResultException
Thrown if a result of a database request is expected but there wasn't any.
PersistenceException
Generic exception that is thrown if any unexpected thing happened while database operations.
